TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable PeerApplication extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class PeerApplication Implements IDisposable, IEquatable(Of PeerApplication), ISerializable
type PeerApplication = class interface IDisposable interface IEquatable<PeerApplication> interface ISerializable

summary.span: 代表可與對等共同作業基礎結構一起使用的應用程式。

span.span: Represents an application that is available for use with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式是從端點軟體或軟體功能提供一組對等。An application is a set of software or software features available to a peer from an endpoint. 通常，這是指網路功能的軟體套件，例如遊戲或其他共同作業應用程式。Commonly, this refers to network-enabled software packages such as games or other collaborative applications. A定義一組的軟體應用程式或元件搭配網路。A defines the set of software applications or components available for use with the network. 此網路可讓基礎結構參與者初始化此應用程式的使用方式。This network enables infrastructure participants to initiate usage of this application. 它們可以起始使用這個類別所識別的應用程式的共同作業工作階段。They may initiate a collaboration session using the application identified by this class. 建構此類別的執行個體，並設定適當的屬性之後, 此物件可用於共同作業工作階段。After constructing an instance of this class and setting the appropriate properties, this object may be used in collaboration sessions. 其用途，即可將它傳遞給對等共同作業和方法，將會啟用或停用它。Its use is accomplished by passing it to the peer collaboration and methods, which will enable or disable it. 全域唯一和之前已成功註冊應用程式，就必須設定這個執行個體的屬性。The globally unique and properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered. 註冊應用程式具有對等共同作業基礎結構之後, 的註冊資訊會保留在登錄中。After registering an application with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure, the registration information persists in the registry. 這可讓應用程式可供共同作業應用程式即使在註冊應用程式的程式已結束。This makes the application available to collaboration applications even after the program which registered the application has exited. 在註冊之後，變更應用程式執行個體上的屬性沒有註冊任何作用。Changing the properties on an application instance after it has been registered has no effect on the registration. 若要更新註冊，應用程式必須取消註冊，然後註冊新的資訊。To update the registration, the application must be unregistered and then registered again with the new information.

summary.span: 初始化新的 執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 全域唯一和之前已成功註冊應用程式，就必須設定這個執行個體的屬性。The globally unique and properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered.

span.span: Array of data that contain a binary object to associate with the peer application.

value.span: 通常是小型影像或 XML BLOB (二進位大型物件)。

span.span: This is commonly a small image or XML blob.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項資料是自由格式，以及所提供的主對等電腦。This data is free form and is provided by the hosting peer. 可以提供資料的最大數量是 4,096 個位元組。The maximum amount of data that can be provided is 4,096 bytes. 這項資料不屬於邀請，卻讓上本機對等的應用程式與相關聯的其他資料。This data is not part of a invitation, but rather allows additional data to be associated with the application on the local peer.

exception.span: 這個二進位資料物件的大小不是小於 0 就是大於 4,096 位元組。

span.span: The size of this binary data object is either less than 0 or greater than 4,096 bytes.
The object has been disposed.

summary.span: 當屬性值設定後，因非同步作業而未引發的所有事件都會有建立該特定 之執行緒上回呼的相關事件處理常式。

span.span: When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific .

value.span: 實作 介面的物件，且由這個型別的執行個體在建立事件處理常式的執行緒上，用來同步處理事件處理常式。

span.span: Object that implements the interface and is used by instances of this type for event handler synchronization on the thread that created it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性的預設設定的值`null`，指出所有事件處理常式會都呼叫系統執行緒集區執行緒上。The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread. 此屬性通常這類設定的 UI 元素執行個體。This property is typically set to a UI element such as a instance.
